lead_paragraph: Hendrick Ramaala of South Africa, who won the New York City Marathon in 2004 and missed winning by a step last year, has entered this year’s race, scheduled for Nov. 5. Ramaala’s entry was announced yesterday, along with that of Martin Lel of Kenya, Rodgers Rop of Kenya and Hailu Negussie of Ethiopia.
